text.section: Every insurer shall provide to the commissioner information to demonstrate to what extent the insurer's rates are based upon its Kentucky experience.

Every insurer shall provide to the commissioner information to demonstrate its compliance with the requirements contained in KRS 304.13-410 which requires workers' compensation rates to be based on the net experience of an employer policyholder who has selected a deductible policy as authorized by KRS 304.13-400.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1119, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 446, sec. 4, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 225, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1988.
